div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1056 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1957 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 8 AE. Under paving slabs within small area Olbia: 1 aes grave (as Burachkov, pl. 1, 6) 6 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 10 [1], 13 [3], 23 [1], 27 [1]) Unc.: 1 AE Disposition: Leningrad (Institute) Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
